Sentencas: The sintering characteristics and physical properties of Ni/YSZ cermets were investigated in connection with the sinterability of YSZ powders and the amount of NiO. Commercial YSZ and pre-calcined YSZ were used for the cermets.
Titulo: Effects of sinterability of YSZ powder and NiO content on characteristics of Ni-YSZ cermets

Sentencas: The sintering shrinkage of Ni/YSZ powder was affected by the kind of YSZ powder and the amount of NiO.
Titulo: Effects of sinterability of YSZ powder and NiO content on characteristics of Ni-YSZ cermets

Sentencas: The effects of the amount of NiO on the sintering shrinkage was higher for the cermets made from commercial YSZ.
Titulo: Effects of sinterability of YSZ powder and NiO content on characteristics of Ni-YSZ cermets

Sentencas: In the sintering region, the shrinkage characteristics were revealed to be affected predominantly by the amount of NiO.
Titulo: Effects of sinterability of YSZ powder and NiO content on characteristics of Ni-YSZ cermets

Sentencas: The constants in the sintering equation were determined and the equations were revealed to express the actual shrinkage behavior well.
Titulo: Effects of sinterability of YSZ powder and NiO content on characteristics of Ni-YSZ cermets

Sentencas: Conductivity as well as porosity were improved by the use of pre-calcined YSZ powder, and these improvements were derived from the decrease of the shrinkage caused by the degradation of the YSZ powder and the formation of a distinct Ni metal network between YSZ granules.
Titulo: Effects of sinterability of YSZ powder and NiO content on characteristics of Ni-YSZ cermets
